title: Herb Society of America
description: The Herb Society of America brings you well-researched information about growing and using herbs. If you are a gardener, chef, herbalist, crafter, or hobbyist, we have something new for you.
cleaned_text: The Herb Society of America is dedicated to promoting the knowledge, use and delight of herbs through educational programs, research, and sharing the experience of its members with the community. Membership Join our 2,200+ current members in studying cultivation and cooking, herb and pollinator conservation, and even topics "beyond the garden," such as herbal wellness, and DIY projects. Go Native Native herbs versus invasives — why does it matter? Upcoming Events Recipes Herb-based recipes for inspiration. Experience herbs in a truly tasty way by enjoying your favorite herb flavors at your dinner table —
